Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.25 Windows 32bit

Problem: VAB/SPH New, Save, Load, Launch and Exit buttons are greyed out and unclickable.

Mods installed:

Reproduction steps:

Screenshots:

screenshot 1

screenshot 2

Crafts load perfectly fine but usually after 5-10 loadings of various .craft files, the craft loads but buttons don't appear to work anymore and the camera is freezed. I can use Engineer delta v window but nothing else.

Debug menu gives me some lines like this:

[LOG 19:51:30.305] Skipped rendering frame because GfxDevice is in invalid state (device lost)

So far any solution on the Internet regarding that error haven't worked. I have my default Ships folder in KSP's root directory, problem still occurs on a new save and after a clean install of the game and updated mods. I had that problem for a looong time. I suspect it's some mod or a combination of them causing this but I'm not sure.

Edit: My "Czosnex" folder only contains a Flags folder.

Log:

output_log.txt

Edited November 24, 2014 by The Czosnex

Anyone? It appears that part mods aren't causing this.

Help me please, this bug is annoying as hell

Edited November 26, 2014 by The Czosnex
I can confirm that this bug still exists in KSP 1.1.2, a fix is necessary.
